mapper.insert: insert into TbClient (clientid, clientname, clientsex, clientnation, clientbirthdayaddress, identityid, address, reserve1, reserve2, reserve3, reserve4) values (#{clientid}, #{clientname}, #{clientsex}, #{clientnation}, #{clientbirthdayaddress}, #{identityid}, #{address}, #{reserve1}, #{reserve2}, #{reserve3}, #{reserve4})
